import React, {useState, useEffect, Component} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar' import { Dropdown } from 'semantic-ui-react' const NewCourse = (props) => { const [languageState, setLanguageState] = useState([{ key }]) const [state, setState] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/languages/all/names`) .then(response => setLanguageState(response.data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, [state]) useEffect(() => { const script = document.createElement('script') }) return (
COURSES
NEW COURSE

Course Creator

Select a task type
Option 1
Option 2
) } export default NewCourse;
